content: rounds 1-2 until 28 32 36 40 sts remain begin gusset work decrease round only until 16 20 20 24 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes weave in gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped all loose ends stitch along side of heel pm to indicate start of you may make copies for your own personal use you may not distribute this in any hardcopy or electronic format pb & w
